EmailTemplate.description: Email to contacts inviting them to join us for a baseball game
EmailTemplate.name: 18-03 FL Launch Event
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Solar Invites You to a Night of Baseball!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're invited to a night of solar and baseball!
Please join BlueWave Solar next Monday evening, March 19th, at the Rays vs. Yankees game at 6:35PM.
To RSVP, email marketing@bluewavesolar.com simply saying "Yes! I'd like to come to the game" and we'll add you to the list to join us at the Third Base Club for dinner, drinks, baseball, and chats about solar!
Who Is BlueWave Solar? BlueWave Solar is a renewable energy company founded on a mission to provide Solar to Everyone, Everywhere. BlueWave partners with contractors like you to finance solar projects and achieve this mission! We were born in Boston, and have since expanded into RI, NY, SC, NC - and most recently, Florida!
We look forward to getting to know you!
- All of us here at BlueWave
